import Header from './components/Header' import initialEmails from './data/emails' import './App.css' import { useState } from 'react' function App() { // Use initialEmails for state console.log(initialEmails) const [emails, setEmails] = useState(initialEmails) const starredEmailsCounter = emails.filter(email => email.starred).length const readEmailsCounter = emails.filter(email => !email.read).length return (
  • {}} > Inbox ?
  • {}} > Starred {starredEmailsCounter}
  • {}} />
    {emails.map(email => (
  • {email.sender} {email.title}
    • ))}
) } export default App
